attributes.action: Say NO to speed cameras set to exactly 70!
attributes.additional_details:
Say NO to Speed cameras set at exactly 70.

This petition seeks all speed cameras be set at 10%+2mph for safety.

Going 0.5mph over the limit now results in points and fine.

THIS ISN'T SAFE!
People will panick and break automatically incase they are going 0.5mph to fast. Cars and cameras may be accurate but what if you look at your Speedo from the wrong angle -paralax exists for such a small difference in speed.
Having to watch your Speedo so accurately will mean less time watching the road!

If road safety is the priority over traffic flow, how can you justify putting lives at risk to help ensure the motorway flows better. Doing this will reduce flow due to accidents.

Stop this money making move and ensure safety on our roads!

http://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/motorists-face-strict-70mph-speed-8464386
